oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Copperhead Mint Condition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Copperhead (Musical group); Williams, Hank, Jr., 1949-;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black on split fountain, copper to white) announcing the re- release of the Copperhead album Mint Condition. Poster features metal photoplates of the band members. Copperhead is Hank William Jr.'s Legendary Bama Band including Wayne "Animal" Turner, lead vocals and guitar; Billy "E" Earheart, keys and Hammond; Bill Marshall, drums and percussion; and Ray "White Lightning" Barrickman.
